title: Jamie Dimon says JPMorgan spends $2B a year on AI
description: Jamie Dimon said Tuesday that JPMorgan Chase now spends about $2 billion a year on artificial intelligence – and breaks even on the investment thanks to savings the tech has created.
content:
JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said Tuesday the bank now spends about $2 billion a year on artificial intelligence – and breaks even on the investment thanks to savings the tech has created.

title: CareerBuilder, Job Search Site Toppled by AI, Wraps Liquidation
description: The owner of former job recruitment sites CareerBuilder and Monster, which blamed artificial intelligence for their demise, won court approval to end a liquidation case by paying lenders and other creditors less than 10% of what they are owed.
content:
The owner of former job recruitment sites CareerBuilder and Monster, which blamed artificial intelligence for their demise, won court approval to end a liquidation case by paying lenders and other creditors less than 10% of what they are owed.

title: Robin Williams’ daughter slams those ‘puppeteering’ him with AI online
description: 'TikTok slop' is a term used to describe low-quality content generated using artificial intelligence that is often circulated on social media.
content:
Robin Williams’ daughter, Zelda Williams, has asked the public to stop “puppeteering” and sending her AI-generated videos of her late father, who died by suicide in 2014.
“Please, just stop sending me AI videos of Dad,” Zelda, 36, posted on her Insta... [3494 chars]

title: Investors pour cash into AI startups for plaintiffs lawyers
description: Investors since last week have put up more than $250 million to back a pair of artificial intelligence startups aimed at plaintiff-side lawyers, valuing the companies at a combined $3 billion.
content:
Oct 7 (Reuters) - Investors since last week have put up more than $250 million to back a pair of artificial intelligence startups aimed at plaintiff-side lawyers, valuing the companies at a combined $3 billion.

title: Foundation Capital’s Inaugural Fintech AI Build Demo Day: A Glimpse into the Future of Financial Technology
description: On September 30, 2025, Foundation Capital hosted the inaugural Fintech AI Build Demo Day at its San Francisco headquarters. The event was a significant milestone for the firm’s accelerator program, which seeks to support emerging founders shaping the future of financial technology (fintech) and artificial intelligence (AI). title: Advancing disease research with AI and Bayesian modeling at UT Arlington
description: Artificial intelligence can solve problems at remarkable speed, but it's the people developing the algorithms who are truly driving discovery.

title: Deloitte To Repay Australian Government After AI-Generated Errors Found In Official Report
description: Global consultancy Deloitte has agreed to partially refund its $440,000 fee to the Australian government after admitting to the use of generative artificial intelligence (AI) tools in preparing "Future Made in Australia" an official report— a move that later led to several factual errors and fabricated references.

title: Fed's Kashkari says he's skeptical AI is replacing workers, but it may push up rates
description: Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari on Tuesday said that while he doesn't believe artificial intelligence will quickly replace U.S. workers, massive investment in AI data centers will tend to drive borrowing costs higher, even if the Fed reduces its short-term policy rate.

title: Parent called 999 after TikTok viral 'AI homeless man' prank
description: AN 'extremely concerned' parent called 999 after their daughter pranked them with a social media trend involving artificial intelligence.
content:
Poole Police has issued a warning after they were called by a parent who was misled by a viral social media trend.
The 'AI homeless man prank' has featured on sites such as TikTok and Instagram. People use AI-generated images to create the illusion t... [1045 chars]

title: Inter-State Solver Gang Busted: Artificial Intelligence Used in Exam Scam
description: The Lucknow Police exposed a gang using AI to replace candidates with imposters for the IBPS Clerk Exam. They arrested 10 members involved in forging identity documents, seizing devices and cash. The gang, led by Anand Kumar, charged candidates significant sums for their illicit services.
content: The Lucknow Police have uncovered an inter-state solver gang that used AI to manipulate exam admissions, arresting ten suspects in connection with the fraud. The group replaced legitimate candidates with imposters for the 2025 IBPS Clerk Exam, a seri... [675 chars]
